alert.note: Alert for Christian; Greene (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 29 at 2:59PM CDT until August 29 at 3:45PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Springfield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Christian County in southwestern Missouri... South central Greene County in southwestern Missouri... * Until 345 PM CDT. * At 259 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Republic, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Southern Springfield... Nixa... Republic... Battlefield... Clever... Brookline... This includes Interstate 44 near mile marker 69. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
